department.ch: 環境工程研究所碩士班

remark.en: Contact the advisor about the class time and classroom
remark.ch: 表列時間僅為代表性上課時間，詳細上課時間及地點請依各指導教授規定

en.competency: The ability to justify principles of judgment and choice with considering the relation between social welfare and environmental sustainability
en.Assessments: Presentation/Oral Exam ， Research Report(printed on paper) ， Practices/Experiments

en.competency: The ability to define and analyze environmental issues, to strategically plan and propose potential solutions
en.Assessments: Presentation/Oral Exam ， Research Report(printed on paper) ， Practices/Experiments

en.competency: The ability to implement scientific knowledge and engineering techniques in the face of environmental problems
en.Assessments: Presentation/Oral Exam ， Research Report(printed on paper) ， Practices/Experiments

en.competency: The ability to assess prospective needs at the macro level, to formulate decision-making, and to direct R & D.
en.Assessments: Presentation/Oral Exam ， Research Report(printed on paper) ， Practices/Experiments

en.competency: The ability to lead positive and effective communication, coordination, cooperation and integration.
en.Assessments: Presentation/Oral Exam ， Research Report(printed on paper) ， Practices/Experiments

en.competency: The ability to persistently innovate intelligent humanities, science and engineering.
en.Assessments: Presentation/Oral Exam ， Research Report(printed on paper) ， Practices/Experiments

ch.competency: 以人為本的社會價值與環境價值判斷與抉擇能力
ch.Assessments: 口頭報告/口試 ， 專題研究報告(書面) ， 實作/實驗

ch.competency: 符合系統思維的環境問題發現、分析及解決能力
ch.Assessments: 口頭報告/口試 ， 專題研究報告(書面) ， 實作/實驗

ch.competency: 合乎情理法的環境科學知識與工程技術運用能力
ch.Assessments: 口頭報告/口試 ， 專題研究報告(書面) ， 實作/實驗

ch.competency: 前瞻宏觀的需求分析、規劃決策及科技研發能力
ch.Assessments: 口頭報告/口試 ， 專題研究報告(書面) ， 實作/實驗

ch.competency: 積極有效的溝通表達、協調合作及整合領導能力
ch.Assessments: 口頭報告/口試 ， 專題研究報告(書面) ， 實作/實驗

ch.competency: 持續不斷的人文、科學及工程智能學習創新能力
ch.Assessments: 口頭報告/口試 ， 專題研究報告(書面) ， 實作/實驗

en: Department:MSc (Adult Learning) in Environmental Engineering only.Year:Second Year only.
Department:MSc (Adult Learning) in Environmental Engineering only.
ch: 系所:限環境工程研究所碩士在職專班。年級:限二年級。
